Functions
LED Driver

Driver to control the LEDs on the EMV demo board.

Functions

void ledOn (u8 leds)
 Turn on LEDs on the EMV board.
void ledOff (u8 leds)
 Turn off LEDs on the EMV board.

Available LEDs

#define LED_GREEN   (1)
#define LED_ORANGE   (2)
#define LED_RED   (4)
#define LED_BLUE   (8)
#define LED_ALL   (LED_GREEN | LED_ORANGE | LED_RED | LED_BLUE)

Define Documentation

#define LED_ALL   (LED_GREEN | LED_ORANGE | LED_RED | LED_BLUE)

All LEDs available on the EMV board.

#define LED_BLUE   (8)

Blue LED (schematic LED1).

#define LED_GREEN   (1)

Green LED (schematic LED4).

#define LED_ORANGE   (2)

Orange LED (schematic LED3).

#define LED_RED   (4)

Red LED (schematic LED2).
